ModMetaData.description:
Version 1.2, Version 1.3 Have you ever wanted your pawn to ascend to a higher plane of magic? One without bounds, one with limitless potential? There is a process known by some as Apotheosis where one can achieve divinity.
This knowledge was not meant for mankind, yet it is here to stay. Acquiring the knowledge will give you demi-god-like potential. You are not an immortal by any means, but your potential for magic is boundless.
(Highly recommend Immortals mod for full effect)
------- End Power Monologue here -------
Provides a custom class via A RimWorld of Magic that is a demi-god. The class will have multiple spells and abilities that are present in other RimWorld Magic class mods and the primary package.
Credit to those developers that made the magic. (Torann RimWorld of Magic, Kure's Rimworld of Magic Expansion Pack) This is just a custom class to provide an OP kit for a pawn. This is primarily for my own usage, use at your own risk. I don't want to break my game as much as I don't want to break yours! :) I'm currently running it without issue. I did notice that the more abilities that were available, the larger performance impact it had. My system normally runs at 100 FPS and this class does not really affect the FPS anymore than any other class in a meaningful way at least for my setup.
There are NO changes anywhere else, this is simply a clean class implementation following Torann's guide. (This will not conflict or modify any existing pawns or magic users, it is 100% isolated)
You can read the changes below on what this provides. You are by no means unkillable or even OP at the start. This simply provides more spells in a kit that you can achieve that are powerful. Over time, you can become unstoppable-- but you don't start that way.
New Class: Demi-God Might (Same kit as Psionic class but without barrier, I had some issues finding the spell upgrade values for that one so I just took it out of this class) Magic (spells are below) Max Magic Level: 500 Max Might Level: 200
Yes there will be some points leftover, I did not specifically make it so you cap out. Think of it this way, you constantly grow in power lore wise even when you achieved everything. If anyone wants me to reduce the levels so there is no overage I'm glad to do so. :) For my own purposes, I don't particularly care one way or the other.
Notable Magic Traits: 40% reduced cooldown on all magic spells and might abilities 1000% increased mana regen and mana pool (I believe this may also apply to the stamina pool)
